abstract: Average rates for 30-year fixed-rate mortgages fell below 4 percent for the first time on record.
snippet: Average rates for 30-year fixed-rate mortgages fell below 4 percent for the first time on record.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)

keywords.name: unknown
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)|FMCC|OTCBB

lead_paragraph: The average rate for a conventional, 30-year fixed-rate mortgage fell below 4 percent for the first time on record, according to Freddie Mac's weekly market survey that came out on Thursday.
